title: BBC Local Live: Derbyshire on Friday 13 January 2017 - BBC News
summary: snow and ice causes travel problems .
man filmed kicking cat in head .
little mix announce donington park show .
rams star hughes signs new contract .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: thanks for joining us for today 's local live updates .
we 'll be back with more news , sport , travel and weather on monday morning .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather : frosty night ahead
text: there will be clear spells tonight with scattered cloud and the chance of a wintry shower in the early hours .
lows of -1c ( 30f ) with a widespread sharp frost likely .
author: Alexandra Hamilton
BBC weather presenter

documents.title: latest headlines for derbyshire and east staffordshire
text: here 's a final recap of today 's top stories :
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your snow in derbyshire
text: this was how calke abbey looked this afternoon .
the photo was uploaded by weather watcher sky girl .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch : raccoon dog rescued from trap 'will make a full recovery '
text: a raccoon dog , which was caught in a trap in derbyshire , will make a full recovery , rspca vets in cheshire say .
they 're looking after the wild animal at their stapeley grange centre near nantwich after someone found her in the trap in glossop .
the trap was removed under sedation in manchester before the raccoon dog was taken to the cheshire centre .
stapeley grange manager lee stewart told me for bbc radio stoke that the animal had n't suffered any broken bones and `` will make a full recovery '' .
author: Tim Wedgwood
BBC Local Live

documents.title: cat kicker could face prison or huge fine
text: rspca inspector sarah burrows said : inflicting such a horrific attack on a defenceless cat is sickening and it 's important we track down the people responsible .
if prosecuted under the animal welfare act of causing unnecessary suffering to an animal , a person could face up to six months in prison and a fine of up to £ 20,000 . ''
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man caught on camera kicking cat
text: police and the rspca are investigating after a man 's pet cat was violently kicked outside his home in derby .
patrick mcgeary captured the moment millie was attacked on cctv and says it 's left him angry and upset .
the cat suffered a suspected broken jaw and is being treated by vets .
warning : video contains upsetting content
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: rams v foxes to be shown live
text: derby county 's fa cup fourth round match against leicester city is going to be televised .
the pride park encounter will kick off at the slightly unusual time of 19:55 on friday 27 january .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: hunt for park motorbike trio
text: give police a call if you can help identify these nitwits .
motorbikes seen riding through alvaston park , any information please ring 101
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: parents angered by shoe crackdown
text: a derby school criticised by parents for getting tough about its footwear policy has hit back saying it was reminding them of the need to wear proper shoes and not introducing a new rule .
author: Derby Telegraph

documents.title: brewers boss wants more goals
text: nigel clough says strengthening his attacking options will be his priority in the remainder of the transfer window .
the burton albion manager says he 's happy with his defensive set-up but still wants more options up front .
author: BBC Derby Sport

documents.title: your snow in derbyshire
text: you 've got weather watcher paula to thank for this splendid photo of edale .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: two more roads reopen
text: that 's three out of four back open - just waiting on you now , holme moss .
latest update on the roads : the a57 snake pass and the a53 axe edge are now open .
drive with care .
a6024 holme moss remains closed .
the a6 and roads through bakewell okay ?
hi marc - the only road closure we 're aware of at the moment is the a6024 holme moss .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: route reopens
text: you can now use cat and fiddle - but only if you promise not to drive like a wally .
latest update : the a54 cat & fiddle now open , passable with care .
the a6024 holme moss , a57 snake pass and a53 axe edge remain closed .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your views : more council tax cash for police
text: the idea of increasing council tax to give police in derbyshire more money has n't gone down very well on our facebook page .
ajit atwal posted : `` get rid of the police & crime commissioner & all of his office & that 's a substantial amount of saving there simple . ''
brenda fox concurred , saying : `` well said we do n't need them and their salaries would pay for more policing !
why should the poor get even poorer ! ! ''
author: Facebook

documents.title: busy gritters
text: gritting teams are working round the clock to treat all primary and secondary routes in the county .
check routes :
hi is the a623 and a625 passable please ?
thanks
hi alicia .
this is the latest information we have from tideswell .
this image is from our camera on the a623 .

documents.title: 'crash for cash ' gang go on trial
text: the trial has begun of a gang of alleged fraudsters who involved themselves in a so-called `` crash for cash '' conspiracy .
author: Derby Telegraph

documents.title: 'we 're looking for players of all ages and abilities ' # peoplescup
text: have you ever dreamt of walking out onto the pitch at wembley or lifting a cup in front of 90,000 fans ?
the 2017 fa people 's cup - the uk 's biggest free five-a-side football competition - is offering the chance to do just that .
find out about the 16 different categories and dates of the competition here - then find out where your nearest venue is and how to sign up here .

documents.title: your comments : new deal for hughes
text: a joyous response on bbc derby sport 's facebook page after will hughes put pen to paper on a new rams deal .
ian carter wrote : `` nice one will , true ram , now let 's get you that premier league football you want ! ''
martin cook went further : `` that 's the best bit of business we will do in this transfer window . ''
author: Facebook

documents.title: midfielder heads to carlisle
text: chesterfield midfielder gary liddle has swapped a league two relegation battle for a league one promotion chase by signing for carlisle united on an 18-month deal .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: watch : spectacular starling shows in derbyshire
text: have you seen this yet ?
it features some amazing murmurations spotted in stoney middleton .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: mcclaren happy hughes is staying
text: the new will hughes deal has got rams boss steve mcclaren all excited .
he told the club 's website : will is an exciting young talent and a really important player for this football club .
i 'm excited about seeing him continue to develop , improve and play a key role here at derby county moving forwards . ''
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: new deal for hughes
text: big news rams fans - will hughes has signed a new three-and-a-half-year contract .
the 21-year-old ( seen here doing the greased lightning dance ) has played 170 times for derby since making his debut five years ago .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: derby v burton moved
text: new date for your diary , football fans - the derby county v burton albion match at pride park stadium has been put back to tuesday 21 february .
the teams were due to meet on saturday 28 january but that 's no longer possible due to the rams selfishly failing to get knocked out of the fa cup .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your snow in derbyshire
text: ready for another snow here 's the scene in hollinsclough - courtesy of weather watcher heatherbell .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: snow closes schools
text: the wintry weather has given pupils the day off at 14 schools in derbyshire .
the list includes queen elizabeth 's grammar school in ashbourne .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: little mix 'understand brilliance '
text: the press release announcing little mix 's donington park show is suitably bombastic .
it said : `` pop acts like little mix do n't come along that often .
`` growing better and bolder with each new album , they understand the brilliance of pop music and how it relates to their passionate and loyal fan base . ''
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: donington park show for little mix
text: stop everything - little mix have announced a gig at donington park on 1 july .
tickets go on sale on monday .
here they are showing off their fingers .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: winter wonderland
text: pretty thick in buxton - perfect for snowman building !
author: Matthew Barlow
BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: nugent could face leeds
text: derby county 's new striker david nugent is available to make his debut at leeds united this evening .
will hughes is also back from suspension for the televised game at elland road .
author: BBC Derby Sport

documents.title: council tax rise 'to generate critical revenue '
text: hardyal dhindsa said a recent consultation found 73 % of people supported increasing the policing portion of the council tax bill by 2 % or higher .
he said : `` the overwhelming majority of local people living in derbyshire understand the burden we face and are willing to support this small but necessary rise to generate critical revenue . ''
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: police boss wants more council tax cash
text: derbyshire 's police and crime commissioner hardyal dhindsa wants to increase the amount of council tax that goes towards policing by 2 % .
he said the rise would cost the average household just over £ 3.50 a year and bring in an extra £ 1m - the equivalent of 25 police officers .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: good morning : join us for today 's live coverage
text: hi everyone .
here 's how snowy it is where we are - how are things with you ?
i 'll be bringing you all of today 's news , sport , travel and weather so get in touch at any time via email , facebook or twitter .
author: Gavin Bevis
